org.apache.commons.lang3.math

类 IEEE754rUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.lang3.math.IEEE754rUtils

  • public class IEEE754rUtils
extends Object

    Provides IEEE-754r variants of NumberUtils methods.

    See: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_754r

    从以下版本开始:
    2.4

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      IEEE754rUtils()

    • 方法详细资料

      • min

        public static double min(double... array)

        Returns the minimum value in an array.

        参数:
        array - an array, must not be null or empty
        返回:
        the minimum value in the array
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if array is empty
        从以下版本开始:
        3.4 Changed signature from min(double[]) to min(double...)

      • min

        public static float min(float... array)

        Returns the minimum value in an array.

        参数:
        array - an array, must not be null or empty
        返回:
        the minimum value in the array
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if array is empty
        从以下版本开始:
        3.4 Changed signature from min(float[]) to min(float...)

      • min

        public static double min(double a,
                         double b,
                         double c)

        Gets the minimum of three double values.

        NaN is only returned if all numbers are NaN as per IEEE-754r.

        参数:
        a - value 1
        b - value 2
        c - value 3
        返回:
        the smallest of the values

      • min

        public static double min(double a,
                         double b)

        Gets the minimum of two double values.

        NaN is only returned if all numbers are NaN as per IEEE-754r.

        参数:
        a - value 1
        b - value 2
        返回:
        the smallest of the values
